description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'NotesHome' which manages the main page of a notes application. It includes UI layout, state initialization with notes data, and methods for selecting and creating notes.

classes.name: NotesHome
classes.description: A LightningJS component managing the notes application's main interface, layout, and interactions.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Updates the selected note ID based on user selection.

methods.name: newNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and updates the selected note ID.

methods.name: enterHover
methods.description: Handles hover effect for the 'New' button by changing its background color.

methods.name: leaveHover
methods.description: Resets the 'New' button background color when hover ends.
